common.downloadFailed: Download failed. Please check your network connection.

welcome.tagline: AI-Powered Creative Tools at Your Fingertips

models.title: Model Browser
models.description: Browse and explore AI models for image, video, and audio generation

playground.title: Playground
playground.description: Multi-tab workspace to run models with custom parameters

templates.title: Templates
templates.description: Save and reuse your favorite configurations

history.title: History
history.description: Track and review your recent predictions

freeTools.title: Free Tools
freeTools.description: Powerful AI tools that run locally - no API key needed

playground.title: Playground
playground.selectModelPrompt: Select a model to configure parameters
playground.configureAndRun: Configure the model and click Run to generate

capture.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission denied. Please allow access in your browser settings.
capture.noCameraFound: No camera found. Please connect a camera and try again.
capture.micPermissionDenied: Microphone permission denied. Please allow access in your browser settings.
capture.noMicFound: No microphone found. Please connect a microphone and try again.

maskEditor.title: Mask Editor
maskEditor.hint: White areas reveal, black areas hide

playground.savedToAssetsDesc: Output saved to your assets folder
playground.unsupportedFormat: This output format cannot be saved as an asset

optimizer.title: Optimize Prompt
optimizer.enterPromptError: Please enter a prompt or provide an image

flappyBird.clickToStart: Click or press Space to start a game

history.title: History
history.notAvailableDesc: The prediction history API is not available at this time.

templates.title: Templates
templates.noTemplatesDesc: Save your playground configurations as templates for quick reuse
templates.renameDesc: Enter a new name for this template
templates.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
templates.mergeDesc: Add imported templates, skip duplicates (same name + model)
templates.replaceAllDesc: Delete existing templates and replace with imported ones
templates.invalidFileDesc: The selected file is not a valid templates export
templates.batchDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} template(s)? This action cannot be undone.

assets.title: My Assets
assets.subtitle: {{count}} saved outputs
assets.apiKeyRequired: Please configure your WaveSpeed API key to view assets.
assets.noAssetsDesc: Enable auto-save in Settings to automatically save your generated outputs, or manually save them from the Playground.
assets.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This will permanently remove the file from your disk.
assets.bulkDeleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} asset(s)? This will permanently remove the files from your disk.
assets.textPreviewUnavailable: Text preview not available. Open file location to view.

q4k.description: Recommended: Fast inference with good quality, ~2.5GB

q6k.description: High quality: Best results, slower generation, ~3.5GB

q8.description: Highest quality: Maximum precision, slower generation, ~4GB

errors.desktopRequired: This feature requires the desktop app. Please download WaveSpeed Desktop or try the online version.

tips.intelMacUnsupported: Local Z-Image is only supported on Apple Silicon Macs.
tips.linuxArmUnsupported: Linux ARM is not supported for local Z-Image.
tips.windowsArmUnsupported: Windows ARM is not supported for local Z-Image.
tips.linuxCpuOnly: Local Z-Image runs on CPU only on Linux. It may be slow—reduce steps or image size.
tips.windowsVulkanRequired: Local Z-Image on Windows requires Vulkan-capable GPU drivers. If unavailable, generation will be slow or may fail.
tips.slowWithoutMetal: Metal acceleration is not available. Generation will run on CPU and may be slow—reduce steps or image size.

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: Enter your WaveSpeed API key to access the models
apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.savedDesc: Your API key has been validated and saved successfully.
apiKey.invalidDesc: The API key could not be validated. Please check and try again.
apiKey.clearedDesc: Your API key has been removed.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look of the application
appearance.themeDesc: Choose how the application looks. Auto will follow your system preference.

language.title: Language
language.label: Language
language.changedDesc: The application language has been changed.

assets.title: Assets
assets.description: Configure how generated outputs are saved
assets.autoSaveDesc: Automatically save generated images, videos, and audio to your assets folder
assets.autoSaveEnabledDesc: Generated outputs will be saved automatically
assets.autoSaveDisabledDesc: You can still save outputs manually from the playground
assets.directoryDesc: Choose where to save your generated outputs
assets.directoryChangedDesc: New outputs will be saved to {{path}}
assets.desktopOnly: This feature requires the desktop application

cache.title: Cache
cache.description: Manage cached AI models and data
cache.clearedDesc: AI model cache has been cleared. Models will be re-downloaded when needed.

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.description: Configure download settings for AI models
downloads.downloadTimeoutDesc: Maximum time to wait when downloading AI models

updates.title: Updates
updates.stableDesc: Receive stable releases with thoroughly tested features.
updates.nightlyDesc: Receive nightly builds with the latest features (may be unstable).
updates.autoCheckDesc: Automatically check for updates when the app starts.
updates.channelChangedDesc: Switched to {{channel}} channel. Click "Check for Updates" to see available updates.
updates.downloaded: Update downloaded! Version {{version}} is ready to install.
updates.notAvailableInDev: Auto-update is not available in development mode.
updates.devModeDesc: Auto-update is disabled in development mode.

about.title: About
about.aboutText: An open-source desktop application for running AI models with WaveSpeed API.

apiKeyRequired.title: API Key Required
apiKeyRequired.defaultDesc: Please configure your WaveSpeed API key in Settings.

freeTools.title: Free Tools
freeTools.description: Free, fast, and powerful AI tools

videoEnhancer.title: Video Enhancer
videoEnhancer.description: Enhance videos up to 4x resolution using AI

imageEnhancer.title: Image Enhancer
imageEnhancer.description: Enhance images up to 4x resolution using AI

faceEnhancer.title: Face Enhancer
faceEnhancer.description: Enhance and restore face quality using AI
faceEnhancer.noFaces: No faces detected in the image

faceSwapper.title: Face Swapper
faceSwapper.description: Swap faces between images using AI
faceSwapper.targetHint: Image where faces will be replaced
faceSwapper.noSourceFace: No face detected in source image
faceSwapper.noTargetFaces: No faces detected in target image
faceSwapper.clickToSelect: Click on faces to select which ones to swap
faceSwapper.clickFaceToSwap: Click on a face to swap

backgroundRemover.title: Background Remover
backgroundRemover.description: Remove image backgrounds instantly using AI

imageEraser.title: Image Eraser
imageEraser.description: Remove unwanted objects from images using AI
imageEraser.hint: Draw over objects you want to remove, then click Remove Objects

segmentAnything.title: Segment Anything
segmentAnything.description: Select and cut out any object with a single click
segmentAnything.hoverToPreview: Hover over objects to preview segmentation
segmentAnything.clickToRefine: Click to add more points, right-click to exclude areas
segmentAnything.clearPointsTooltip: Clear all points and return to hover preview mode
segmentAnything.hint: Left-click to include areas, right-click to exclude areas

backWarning.title: Processing in Progress
backWarning.description: A task is currently processing. Are you sure you want to go back? This will cancel the current operation.

videoConverter.title: Video Converter
videoConverter.description: Convert videos between formats (MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI)
videoConverter.supportedFormats: Supports MP4, WebM, MOV, AVI, MKV

audioConverter.title: Audio Converter
audioConverter.description: Convert audio between formats (MP3, AAC, FLAC, WAV)
audioConverter.supportedFormats: Supports MP3, M4A, OGG, WAV, FLAC

imageConverter.title: Image Converter
imageConverter.description: Convert images between formats (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF)
imageConverter.supportedFormats: Supports JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP

mediaTrimmer.title: Media Trimmer
mediaTrimmer.description: Trim videos or audio to a specific duration

mediaMerger.title: Media Merger
mediaMerger.description: Merge multiple video or audio files into one
mediaMerger.sameFormatNote: Files must have the same format for lossless merging
